___intfName.description: Name of the network interface inside the chute

___requests.description: Hardware features required by the chute when assigning a physical interface

___hwmode.description: Required operating mode (11b for old hardware, 11g for 2.4 GHz, 11a for 5 GHz)

___options.description: Additional options to pass to the AP

___hidden.description: Disable broadcasting the ESSID in beacons

___isolate.description: Disable forwarding traffic between connected clients

___key.description: Password required from clients to connect

___type.description: Network type, must be wifi for an AP

___ipv4_network.description: Request specific IP network in slash notation

___relay.description: Address of a DHCP server if this server will be acting as a relay agent (experimental)

___limit.description: Size of address range beginning at start value.

___dns.description: List of DNS servers to advertise to connected clients

___l3bridge.description: Bridge to another network using ARP proxying (experimental)
